thread.title: Hot Martin O’Malley: The Debate’s Real Winner
thread.title_full: Hot Martin O’Malley: The Debate’s Real Winner -- The Cut

author: Jessica Roy
title: Hot Martin O’Malley: The Debate’s Real Winner
text:
Hot dad Martin O'Malley. Photo: Justin Sullivan/Getty Images
Hillary Clinton may have won last night's Democratic debate, but it was another candidate who won our hearts: Martin O'Malley, the former governor of Maryland and current President of Hot Dads.
Martin O'Malley's #DemDebate prep: JosABank tie, workout sesh and a guitar http://t.co/OtWu6gMNbU pic.twitter.com/dtmlWvYkry
— Mashable (@mashable) October 14, 2015 Twitter was a-flurry with news of O'Malley's extreme handsomeness.
BUT WILL THEY TAKE AWAY MARTIN O'MALLEY'S GUNS? pic.twitter.com/rpdhGR9xNX
— t.c. (@chillmage) October 14, 2015 ATTENTION @_calru AND I HAVE DECIDED THAT MARTIN O MALLEY IS A PILF (politician id like to frick) AND ALSO A HOT DAD JOIN US
— eloise (@eloise_syd) October 14, 2015 Martin O'Malley more like Martin O'Daddy
— Olivia Matthews (@oliviaamatts) October 14, 2015 We should select Martin O'Malley because he's a hot dad
— Nia Gibson (@ngibson95) October 14, 2015 THIS JUST IN: O'MALLEY'S HOT DAD BOD POLLING AHEAD OF CLINTON AND SANDERS IN THE BONER APARTMENT pic.twitter.com/b2M9MJP3ln
— large goat father (@cyancrux) October 14, 2015 And you know how when most guys dress up in 19th-century costumes they look more "nerdy cosplayer" than "sexy man on the cover of a romance novel"? Not Martin O'Malley. He wears that War of 1812 costume like he's Zebulon Pike himself:
7/10, would bang. RT @TheFix : That time Martin O’Malley dressed up like a general from the War of 1812. pic.twitter.com/eISDti2h1b
— George Drometer (@GPDrometer) September 15, 2014 He has my vote.
